name: Serveo
description: SSH-based tunnel service - no installation required

fields.name: subdomain
fields.label: Subdomain
fields.help: Optional: Request a specific subdomain (e.g., 'myapp' for myapp.serveo.net)

post_install: Note: Uses SSH, no extra installation needed!

prerequisites.name: ssh
install_instructions: SSH is usually pre-installed on macOS and Linux
Windows: Install OpenSSH or use Git Bash
